summary: This is an emergency contact form for an employee named Stephanie Remington, who worked as an assistant to the manager for LSJE, LLC, a company based in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands. The form was filled out in September 2018, shortly after her start date in August 2018.

keyFacts: LSJE, LLC, a company in St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands, employed Stephanie Remington as an assistant to the manager in August 2018.
An emergency contact form was completed for Remington on September 10, 2018, documenting her personal and medical contact information.
The document shows operational HR activity for a Virgin Islands-based company around the time of Epstein's 2019 arrest, potentially linking to his network of entities.
